name: NSSearchToolbarItem
desc: A toolbar item that contains a search field optimized for performing text-based searches.

items.name: var preferredWidthForSearchField: CGFloat
items.desc: The preferred width for the toolbar item when it has keyboard focus.

items.name: var resignsFirstResponderWithCancel: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that enables the cancel button in the search field to resign the first responder in addition to clearing the contents.

items.name: var searchField: NSSearchField
items.desc: The search field inside the toolbar item.

items.name: func beginSearchInteraction()
items.desc: Starts a search interaction and moves the keyboard focus to the search field.

items.name: func endSearchInteraction()
items.desc: Ends a search interaction by giving up the first responder and adjusting the size of the search field to the available width for the toolbar item if necessary.
